summary.para: Describes the shape at the end of a line or segment.

remarks.para: The following illustration shows the available cap styles for lines or segments. The red portion of the line shows the extra area added by the line cap setting.

summary.para: A cap that does not extend past the last point of the line. Comparable to cap used for objects other than lines.
Half of a square that has a length equal to the line thickness.
A semicircle that has a diameter equal to the line thickness.
An isosceles right triangle whose hypotenuse is equal in length to the thickness of the line.
